reference.shortdesc: Use the xmlnsname element to identify mentions of namespace names, for example, "http://dita.oasis-open.org/architecture/2005/".

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The xmlnsname element enables more precise semantic searching of the DITA source; it also enables distinct formatting.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: The namespace name for XHTML is <xmlnamespace>http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml</xmlnamespace>.
